tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    status ENUM('on', 'off'),
    voice_command_supported BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE voice_commands (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    command_name TEXT,
    device_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE device_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    command_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status TEXT
);
